text: Jya hetune te kura'ana aikatata, tyance irade amhi cangalya prakare janato. Jevha he tumacyakade kana lavuna asatata. Tevha dekhila, ani jevha he sallamasalata karatata tevhahi vastavika he atyacari loka mhanatata ki tumhi asa vyaktice anusarana karanyata magna ahata, jyacyavara jadutona kela gela ahe
